body:
Today i was looking at the forum And wonerdering why people are complaining about None of the Ips Working so i logged into avicus and guess what ... CANNOT CONNECT TO SERVER! Wow.
 I tried All of the Avicus's Ips And They didnt Work o.o Pls Someone Halp
